imdb.title: B-gata H-kei
imdb.plot: A 15-year-old girl has a goal of bedding 100 boys. The trouble is she's a virgin who knows nothing about dating, relationships, or sex.

episodes.title: Bôi mîtsu gâru anata no 'hajimete' watashi ni choudai!!/Houkago daisakusen! Toriaizu kisu shimasho?
episodes.plot: Yamada decides that Kosuda would be a good first sex partner. Her aggressive approach confuses and even frightens him a little.

episodes.title: Souda! Pûru ni ikou Watashi no mizugi, mitaiyone!/Raibaru shutsugen! Dareyo? Ano F kappu!?
episodes.plot: Yamada dons a bikini to entice Kosuda. She becomes concerned when she sees him walking with an F-cup girl.

episodes.title: Anshitsu de kyuusekkin! Chotto kiken na bukatsudou!?/Moeru bunkasai! Gakuen no joou wa kono watashi!!
episodes.plot: In the private confines of the darkroom, Yamada sheds her top and makes a move on Kosuda! Later, she enters a school beauty contest to show the boy exactly what he's missing!

episodes.title: Tokimeku seiya fâsuto kisutte nan no aji?/Kono mama ja kaerenai! Icharabu kouen ni ikouyo!
episodes.plot: The holidays have arrived, and lust is in the air! Kosuda and Yamada are ready to get busy on a special Christmas Eve date, but the park is full of perverts!

episodes.title: Ase to namida no barentain Yamada yori ai? o komete!/Migake eropawâ! Konna kankaku, hajimete nano...
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: Kanejou-san ga kuru! Ano kirakira ga yurusenai!/Barairo no egao no ura ni... Kanejou no kuroi himitsu!!
episodes.plot: Yamada is disturbed by the arrival of a stunning new student from across the sea. The new girl quickly becomes the center of attention and sets her sights on stealing Yamada's man!

episodes.title: Sukumizu de daikettou! Anata ni dake wa zettai makenai!/Natsu no hi no omoide... Yamada, yasei ni kaeru!
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: Wâi! Shuugaku ryokou da! Futarikkiri ni narenakute.../Ore, Yamada no koto ga, su...... sutta monda no chindouchuu
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: Sonna! Minna no miteiru maede... Kirai nante ittenaijan... Aki/Taiikusai ni kakero! Suki ni sureba iijan... Aki
episodes.plot: Kosuda's public confession of love leaves Yamada feeling flustered. And that's before a super-handsome stranger sees her in a cheerleading outfit! Will Kosuda be shunned in the wake of this hunky new arrival?

episodes.title: Kanejouke no ichizoku Serebu na ani no kirakira na himitsu!/Koisuru tochuu? Watashi no Kosuda ni te o dasuna!!
episodes.plot: When Kanejou's brother confesses his interest in Yamada, his stunning little sister takes aim at Kosuda! Will Yamada stick with her ordinary virgin, or go after the hunk and get stuck between siblings?

episodes.title: 2-nen H-gumi no kurisumasu ibu Atashi o beddo ni tsuretette/Kanejou-san ga miteru!? Genkai girigiri 'Nama' housou!
episodes.plot: A luxurious Christmas party provides the perfect opportunity for Yamada and Kosuda to take their relationship to the next level! Too bad someone's watching their every move on a hidden camera!

episodes.title: Bokura no tame ni sekai wa mawaru sayonara... B-gata H-kei/Tenshi ni natta Yamada! Saraba! B-gata H-kei!!
